arts.ttl: BREAKING: Arne Slot makes Alexander Isak call for Atletico Madrid clash after 'far away' admission
arts.sum: Liverpool have named Alexander Isak in their starting line up for Wednesday night's Champions League tie against Atletico Madrid - days after he was left out of the squad vs Burnley

arts.ttl: Liverpool v Atl√©tico Madrid: Champions League ‚Äì live
arts.sum: Champions League latest updates, 8pm BST kick-off Live scores | Follow us over on Bluesky | Email Simon And also, happy birthday Arne Slot! But how happy will that birthday be? Well, Atletico are currently 11th in their league with five points from their first four games, while Liverpool are top of theirs with 12 points from the same number of matches, which seems promising. Plus the Spaniards have five first-team players missing through injury, three ruled out by problems picked up in Saturday‚Äôs 2-0 home win against Villarreal. Less encouraging in many ways was Diego Simeone‚Äôs almost Bondvillainesque assertion that ‚Äúwe have the intention of bringing the game to where we want it to go‚Äù. Atletico‚Äôs injury list includes including their star striker, Julian Alvarez. Liverpool‚Äôs squad includes their own star striker, Alexander Isak, who is expected to start the game on the bench, is not expected to end it there, and is expected to be the myopic focus of pre-match chatter. Arne Slot has said Liverpool have exceeded his expectations by winning their opening four Premier League matches but must improve as they start their Champions League campaign on Wednesday at home against Atl√©tico Madrid. Liverpool‚Äôs perfect start has them top but they have won each game late, becoming the first Premier League side to win four consecutive matches with goals scored after the 80th minute. The results follow the death of Diogo Jota and more than ¬£400m of signings designed to make the squad more suited to Slot‚Äôs vision. ‚ÄúI think we are far above my expectations from during this summer,‚Äù Slot said. arts.sum: Virgil van Dijk has long been one of the best defenders in the world and he expressed his respect for one of the best pragmatists in Europe as he meets with "world-class" operators from Atletico Madrid . But it‚Äôs a team that works so hard, it‚Äôs a world-class manager, it says a lot that he has been at that club for such a long time and I have a lot of respect for that.
